author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...PRISCILLA STRENGTHENS... ...OUTER BANDS ARE AFFECTING THE SOUTHERN BAJA CALIFORNIA PENINSULA...
summary: ...PRISCILLA STRENGTHENS... ...OUTER BANDS ARE AFFECTING THE SOUTHERN BAJA CALIFORNIA PENINSULA... As of 8:00 AM MST Tue Oct 07 the center of Priscilla was located near 19.8, -110.1 with movement NW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 959 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 110 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Priscilla (EP1/EP162025)
